denial_summary: Denied due to bundling edit. Services billed together are not separately payable without appropriate modifier and documentation.
likely_missing_items: Documentation of separate charges for anesthesiology services
recommended_actions: Review CMS policy regarding bundling edits
Verify if the physician has included charges for other qualified anesthetists in the bill
Check if a waiver was granted under certain circumstances
appeal_guidance: Provide documentation to support separate billing and charges, or demonstrate that a waiver was granted.
